alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 11 at 10:46AM AKST until November 13 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible. * WHERE...Anchorage. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. Power outages are possible given the current snow load on area trees. There is a possibility of a brief Turnagain Arm wind early Monday morning, which would exacerbate these issues. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Higher amounts on the Anchorage and Eagle River Hillsides, including Hiland Road.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
